response.original_title: 田中と呪物と怪談と　第５回　後編
response.overview: This is the fifth installment of a special program in which guests also bring their own cursed objects. At the beginning of the second half, Mr. Yasuhiro Hayase, prince of the occult world, introduces "Curse Masks. The bizarre masks have even scarier and more mysterious stories than they appear... Moreover, it is said that when Hayase showed the mask at a previous event, several women in the audience complained of feeling unwell.
response.title: Tanaka to Jumonmono to Kaidan to Dai 5-kai Kōhen
